title: Brother's Account Forgotten.
body: So my brother has forgot his username and password, however he still knows his in-game name. Will that be sufficient to get his account information?

replies.body: Have your brother reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Our account team can help him individually to help with restoring account access. He may be asked some more questions in addition to the summoner name, but we'll do our best to assist.  We will reply back as soon as possible!
